'''Ferdibrand Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Ferdibrand was the son of [[Ferdinand Took]]. He was present at [[Bilbo Baggins]]' [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Farewell Party]] in September {{SR|1401}}.<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The name is composed of ''ferdi'' "peace" and ''brand'' "sword"<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref>

Wikipedia gives the etymology ''frith'' "protection"/ ''far√∞'' "journey" and ''nanth''
